Dialogue: Jerry: Hey look Barry, it's the kid from yesterday!
Barry: Yeah you're right! Good work buddy. I heard you helped out the boss.
Barry: Our bad for roughing you up yesterday. The boss-
Jerry: The boss has had us walking through this forest for hours! My feet are sore!
Barry: Well, you heard what the boss said so suck it up.
Barry: No leaving until we find that traitor Eli.
Jerry: Just wait until we get our hands on him . . .
Barry: Wait a second, haven't we already looked here?
Jerry: I dunno, I stopped paying attention hours ago!
